parameter.name: targetFilePath
parameter.description: Path to the Zip file to create.

parameter.name: includeFiles
parameter.description: Comma-separated patterns for files to include

parameter.name: excludeFiles
parameter.description: Comma-separated patterns for files to exclude

parameter.name: maxFileAge
parameter.description: Maximum age of files to include (e.g., '7d', '2h', '30m')

parameter.name: subDirectoryMaxDepth
parameter.description: Maximum depth of subdirectories to traverse

parameter.name: timeBetweenSizeCheck
parameter.description: Time to wait between file size checks for stability (in milliseconds)

parameter.name: responseVariable
parameter.description: The name of the variable to which the output should be stored.

parameter.name: overwriteBody
parameter.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the response of the operation.
